DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether combined endurance and resistance training can improve muscle strength in children and adolescents with cancer during the intensive treatment phase.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Resistance and Endurance Training in Pediatric Cancer Patients During Intensive Treatment Phase
